DisplayForm.Script:
<UiScreen infoLevel="Normal"> <Title>title</Title> <AutoTransition>10</AutoTransition> <!-- -->
<Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="./12.xml"> <Label imgsrc="submit.jpg">Submit</Label> </Op> <Op type="SkipGo" action="./2.xml"> <Label imgsrc="skipgo.jpg">Skipgo</Label> </Op> <Op type="Back" action="./10.xml"> <Label imgsrc="back.jpg">Back</Label> </Op>
</Operations>
<LinkScreen> <Description>Description (China Thailand Kuwait SaudiArabia Laos )</Description>

</LinkScreen> </UiScreen>
